## ğŸš€ How to Push to GitHub

**Option 1: Double-click the batch file**
```
PUSH-TO-GITHUB.bat
```

**Option 2: Manual commands**
```bash
cd "C:\Users\nikil\Desktop\Webflow Projekt for India\stonearts webshop"
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Initial export: stonearts webshop with documentation"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/Watanusari1/stonearts-Webshop.git
git push -u origin main
```
